item.title: Where should i post something about advertising an server using moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @fabioos fabioos
item.description:
@fabioos wrote:

[quote=“irfan786, post:7, topic:18367”][quote author=fabioos link=topic=27530.msg316376#msg316376 date=1160878829]

Www.moparisthebest.com.
Don’t know about the port.

It’s a Mopar site dedicated about private servers, including advertising. Im sure you can find it if you go to that site.

… 1 last time :x, Where do i find a forum where i can post a topic about my friend’s private server on Moparscape, i dont ask for servers, im asking where i can find a forum where i can post a topic about my friend’s private server so ppl can download it and play it… (rs server, seriously… it’s worth it… and anyway: Www.freewebs.com/yourmumscape/[br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 04:19:58 PM[/size][hr][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=27530.msg316371#msg316371 date=1160878662]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/

the board would be server advertisements
[/quote]

ahh yes, that was exactly what i was looking for! Ty!
[/quote]

Are you kidding me?

[quote author=irfan786 link=topic=27530.msg316370#msg316370 date=1160878595]

Www.moparisthebest.com.
Don’t know about the port.

It’s a Mopar site dedicated about private servers, including advertising. Im sure you can find it if you go to that site.
[/quote][/quote]

ur link took me to webclient…

Read full topic
